-1.5 3-501.16 (A) (2) and (B) Time / Temperature Control for Safety Food, Hot and Cold Holding - In the Beverage Air cooler at the sushi bar, all products that were not thawing were above 41 F. Discussed all TCS foods that needed removing, and products were placed in other coolers. Thermostat on this cooler was lowered. Ensure cooler is set to maintain TCS foods at 41 F or less.
-2.0 2-301.14 When to Wash - An employee was using a cell phone, and then proceeded to handle scoops at the steam table without washing hands. Employee later cracked a raw shell egg into a wok, but did not change gloves and wash hands while continuing to stir and cook. Employee was instructed in both instances to remove gloves, and wash hands. Employees shall wash hands after handling raw animal foods, and after another task that may contaminate the hands, before handling food.
